overview: One of the less popular in the late 70’s movies about the crimes of the gang of bikers. Recall that if the highway crossing the vast American prairie, occasionally interspersed small town, a wave of thugs on motorcycles. Did not recognize any law, but the law of force, wandering the American heartland, the bikers and their girlfriends were kept at bay area. Robbery, rape, arson and the police just sit on their trail, the gang immediately disappeared in another state, where to catch them, according to American law, was extremely difficult. In those years, America has swept a wave of violence perpetrated by gangs of motorcyclists, which was immediately taken up by the filmmakers “for adults.” .Captives brutally raped, exposing a variety of types of sexual humiliation. In the course are gang rape, oral, etc. Often crucified on some couch girl raped once a group of criminals.
tagline: Movie about the crimes of a biker gang.
title: Biker's Orgy of Pain
